channel.title: AppifyWP Pro Demo | WordPress theme For Apps
channel.description: AppifyWP Pro is a WordPress App theme to help developers build amazing landing pages for their apps.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Welcome to our awesome app. This is our primary description.

This is the secondary description of our app. You can put HTML or shortcodes in here to add other content.

For example, here's an ordered list:

  • Some amazing feature 1
  • Some amazing feature 2
  • Some amazing feature 2
Here's some specific text for the iPhone Platform. iPhone!

item.title: iMidiFighter
item.dc:creator: userkind
item.content:encoded:
Features

The core of any Midi Fighter is the grid of sixteen high performance triggers. These genuine SANWA arcade buttons feature super smooth operation with an unparalleled level of sensitivity.
  • You can create beautiful bulleted lists of features using any custom icon available in the Font Awesome library of over 300 icons
  • Some other great feature
  • Another awesome feature you cannot live without

Stunning Details

The Midi Fighter Spectra also features beautiful full-color ring lighting, with color and a range of animations controlled via MIDI. This allows the creation of dynamic and intuitive mappings while also adding visual flair to your performance.

Only The Finest Circuits

Complementing the grid are 6 side-mounted function buttons. Using the Midi Fighter Utility software, these are configurable to send MIDI notes, CCs or even perform special functions such as bank selection.

Technical Specs w Tabs

  • What you can do
  • What you can't do
  • What you should do
The Midi Fighter Spectra is the latest controller by DJ TechTools. Built on the familiar format of the now legendary Midi Fighter Classic, the Spectra features full-color ring lighting, six side mounted configurable function buttons, and TRAKTOR Remix Deck support, all in a highly portable package able to find space in any DJ booth.
Stand out in a world where every thing looks the same. Using our simple online tool you can customize your controller, choosing from a wide range of materials and finishes for the top surface, as well as the color of the triggers and silicone case. Each Midi Fighter Spectra is hand built and individually numbered in our San Francisco workshop following your specifications. With over 1000 combinations available you are sure to find the perfect complement for your unique style.
Excellent for finger drumming in live performance as well as entering drum parts while producing, the Spectra is also perfect for use with Mad Zach’s amazing free weekly sound packs. This means you'll get a constant stream of expertly crafted material for both practice and inspiration. On the DJ front, it comes ready to rock with a wide range of mappings from both DJTT and its huge community allowing it to integrate into any setup with ease. It can also control up to four TRAKTOR Remix Decks, with all clip color information appearing on the grid, and most Remix Deck functions assignable to the side buttons.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: iMidiFighter is a virtual midi instrument modeled after the physical model.
Control all of your VST instruments wirelessly with your iPad!

item.title: Wimbo Music
item.dc:creator: userkind
item.content:encoded:
Reviews

AppifyWP is very well done and allows you to build a web site for your application without knowing the underlying details of building WordPress web sites. You'll save a lot of money because this package is yours for only $49. That's a steal if you ask me.
- Building iPhone Apps
We have two sites already set up with your template and they are looking AWESOME!! I love it. It's great because it was easy for our team to figure out how to administer.
- Michael, CEO of Interdisciplinary Design Collaborative LLC
AWESOME Wordpress Template! This is by far one of the best and easiest to use templates to promote your apps.....period. I switched over from another service and could not be happier.
- Ralph, creator of MoodScanApp

Video

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Wimbo Music is an iPhone app that lets you control every vocal and instrument that make up your favorite cover songs.

BAND IN YOUR HAND

Isolate the part you're learning and hear it with true clarity. Once you've got it licked, mute the part and play it accompanied by the rest of the band.

BAND IN YOUR HAND

Isolate the part you're learning and hear it with true clarity. Once you've got it licked, mute the part and play it accompanied by the rest of the band.

NEVER PLAY ALONE

With Wimbo Music you'll always have a band in your hand ready to jam wherever you are.
This is the finest todo app ever created! You can even create todos for your todos.
In reality though, all you can really do is swipe things until they make pretty colors, making you feel like you've accomplished something great, but really you're just playing with your phone.

item.content:encoded: Welcome to AppifyWP Sites. This is your first post. Edit or delete it, then start blogging!

item.title: Cory Shaw
item.dc:creator: userkind
item.content:encoded: Cory designs and code great user experiences through a user-centered design lens. He is passionate about making complex things easy to use through the use of research, design, front-end coding, and user testing. Cory is an early adopter of new technologies such as html5, ajax, jQuery, mobile, and enjoys spending time with his family, snowboarding, hiking, surfing, and biking.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Cory is the designer and developer of AppifyWP. He enjoys everything tech, being outside, surfing & snowboarding.

item.title: Our Apps
item.dc:creator: userkind
item.content:encoded: We make some of the finest apps known to man. You can browse our full list of apps below. Make sure you download them all!

item.title: Oswald McGregory
item.dc:creator: userkind
item.content:encoded:
Hi, my name is Oswald. In case you couldn't tell from my mug shot, I'm a developer. I write crazy amounts of code without using a mouse. Some of the apps I've built have been known to change the way people think...about thinking.
When I'm not hammering away on the next hot life-changing app, I'm usually playing WOW (handle: epicbeard), or brushing up on my Emacs shortcuts. Sometimes I even write C just for fun.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Oswald has a beard named Ronald. Ronald does about half of the programing, and makes the tough decisions. In Oswald's spare time he enjoys grooming Ronald, playing WOW, and brushing up on his Emacs shortcuts.

item.content:encoded: Meet our team of rock stars.

item.title: Josh Linden
item.dc:creator: userkind
item.content:encoded:
Had some great experience getting my feet wet with clip-on ties in Los Angeles, CA. Spent 2002-2009 developing human brains in Phoenix, AZ. Spent 2001-2005 merchandising sausage for fun and profit. Earned praised for my work managing love in Orlando, FL. Spent the better part of the 90's getting to know toy soldiers in Naples, FL. Spent several years managing yogurt for the underprivileged.
Had some great experience consulting about Elvis Presley for the underprivileged. A real dynamo when it comes to consulting about fatback in West Palm Beach, FL. Spent 2002-2009 developing strategies for Slinkies in the government sector. Spent high school summers lecturing about pubic lice in Las Vegas, NV. Spent 2001-2006 implementing hugs in Bethesda, MD. Spent 2001-2006 testing the market for mosquito repellent in Los Angeles, CA.
What gets me going now is marketing acne in Libya. Spent 2001-2007 lecturing about hula hoops in Africa. Spent a weekend developing xylophones in Jacksonville, FL. What gets me going now is buying and selling weebles on the black market. Spent 2002-2009 investing in childrens books for no pay. Lead a team licensing Roombas in Tampa, FL.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Josh is a humble man. He reins from somewhere in the misty mountains of Alaska where he writes his code among the grizzlies. Josh comes from a long line of fine beard pedigree where only the thickest and most well groomed beards are celebrated among the people.
